PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PowerControlSystem
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of power control system. The property set can be used by the predefined type ELECTRICAL of IfcDistributionSystem. The property set can be used to characterize the system that controls the railway energy network.

PropertyDef.Name: AssemblyInstruction
PropertyDef.Definition: Instructions to describe how the system / equipment / facility is assembled.
